languages.text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat all allies are healed by DoT effects instead of being damaged.

Until the end of combat, all the Executioner's allies are healed by damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} instead of being {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of wounds restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

Until the end of combat, all the Executioner's allies are healed by damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} instead of being {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of wounds restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

Until the end of combat, all of the Executioner's allies are healed by damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of wounds restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, todos los aliados del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} se recuperan con los efectos de daño continuado en lugar de sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. La cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} restauradas es igual al daño que infligiría el efecto tras aplicar todos los modificadores.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, todos los aliados del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} se recuperan con los efectos de daño continuado en lugar de sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. La cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} restauradas es igual al daño que infligiría el efecto tras aplicar todos los modificadores.

languages.text: 戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の味方全体は継続ダメージ効果で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける代わりに回復する。回復する{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の数は、すべての調整が適用された後に受けるだろうダメージ数と等しい。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の味方全体は継続ダメージ効果で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける代わりに回復する。回復する{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の数は、すべての調整が適用された後に受けるだろうダメージ数と等しい。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}所有盟友受到持续伤害效果影响时，不再会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，而是会改为恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。恢复的生命值等同于所有伤害系数结算完毕之后本该造成的伤害值。此效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}所有盟友受到持续伤害效果影响时，不再会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，而是会改为恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。恢复的生命值等同于所有伤害系数结算完毕之后本该造成的伤害值。此效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes werden alle Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s von allen Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten geheilt, anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu erleiden. Die Zahl der wiederhergestellten {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} entspricht dem Schaden, den ein Effekt nach Anwendung aller Modifikatoren verursachen würde.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes werden alle Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s von allen Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten geheilt, anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu erleiden. Die Zahl der wiederhergestellten {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} entspricht dem Schaden, den ein Effekt nach Anwendung aller Modifikatoren verursachen würde.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets de dégâts progressifs soignent les alliés de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} au lieu de leur infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} soignées est égal aux dégâts qu'un effet aurait dû appliquer une fois tous les modificateurs appliqués.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets de dégâts progressifs soignent les alliés de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} au lieu de leur infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} soignées est égal aux dégâts qu'un effet aurait dû appliquer une fois tous les modificateurs appliqués.

languages.text: До конца боя все союзники {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} под действием эффектов периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} не теряют, а восстанавливают {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном урону, который нанесли бы эти эффекты после применения всех модификаторов.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s allies are healed by damage-over-time effects instead of suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} restored is equal to the amount of damage that would be dealt by an effect after all modifiers are applied.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя все союзники {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} под действием эффектов периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} не теряют, а восстанавливают {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном урону, который нанесли бы эти эффекты после применения всех модификаторов.

До конца боя все союзники {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} под действием эффектов периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} не теряют, а восстанавливают {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном урону, который нанесли бы эти эффекты после применения всех модификаторов.
